item.title: Get to the Point - Software vs. Power Point Presentations
item.description: I see presentation after presentation about how good their software is or their customized solution to their problem. However, they never get to the point and show me how to solve my problem.

item.title: Two-Year Vs Base Year and Option Contract
item.description: To assume less risk, the government likes to have the option to have the second year contract exercised, or not. It’s a win for the government and it will speed up the acquisition process. This is beecause the government does wish to exercise the option, it will cost almost no administrative burden to do it.

item.title: IT Software Development without Project Managers
item.description: Who will to do all the administrative work that goes with running projects? Far too many projects start with the lack of a team and lack of project managers.

item.title: Contracts Overview - Cradle to Grave
item.description: You have a bona fide business need. There is a pain-point in the business community that can be solved with some Commercial Off the Shelf (COT) technology. item.title: Career Goals & Navigating Red Tape in the Technology Industry 2021
item.description: In this article, I am going to share ways to start your year off right with some high-tech career goal advice. Especially within the tech industry, where there are record-level employment opportunities.
